name: intro aptos diabetic retinopathy eda starter
full_name: h1 Diabetic Retinopathy h1 A look at the data h2 Reading data and Basic EDA h2 Training Transfer learning h2 Optimize the Metric h2 TTA h2 Submission
description: This is actually very small. Like any real world data set you will encounter noise in both the images and labels. 676 v5 Longer epochs export model and optimize kappa LB 0. The dataset is highly imbalanced with many samples for level 0 and very little for the rest of the levels. Fastai already has TTA implemented but it is not the best for all purposes so I am redefining the fastai function and using my custom version. Diabetic retinopathy affects up to 80 percent of those who have had diabetes for 20 years or more. I use the ResNet50 architecture trained on the ImageNet dataset which has been commonly used for pre training applications in computer vision. BEFORE YOU FORK PLEASE SUPPORT AND UPVOTE Versions v3 first scoring kernel LB 0. We will resize to a much smaller size. This is a better metric when dealing with imbalanced datasets like this one and for measuring inter rater agreement for categorical classification the raters being the human labeled dataset and the neural network predictions. Training We use transfer learning where we retrain the last layers of a pretrained neural network. Clearly this dataset and deep learning problem is quite important. SubmissionLet s now create a submission Making pretrained weights work without needing to find the default filename shuffle dataframe smaller batch size is better for training but may take longer get dataset from dataset Splitting the dataset obtain labels from the level column Data augmentation. The below figure shows an example of a healthy patient and a patient with diabetic retinopathy as viewed by fundus photography source https www. Even one deep learning based system is FDA approved https www.
